# Janitorial Services for the Canadian Coast Guard Base in Seal Cove, Prince Rupert B.C.

## Invitation to Tender
The Fisheries and Oceans, Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) is issuing an Invitation to Tender to provide Janitorial Services for the CCG Base in Seal Cove, Prince Rupert, B.C.

### Tender Details
- **Solicitation Number (n° de la soullication)**: *30004011*
- **Tender Closing Date**: *2024-01-31T14:00:00*
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: *2024-01-31*
- **Expected Contract End Date**: *2025-03-31*

### Tender Description
The successful Contractor must provide all necessary labour, supervision, listed materials, tools, products, and equipment required to offer professional cleaning services to the Canadian Coast Guard for Seal Cove Base. They must ensure that all tasks, activities, deliverables, and milestones outlined in the accompanying documentation are accomplished and completed.

### Contract Requirements
This contract will involve janitorial services for the health and safety of approximately 80 employees in the six industrial buildings of the Seal Cove Base.

### Enquiries and Submissions
All Enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the bid closing date. Late Enquiries may not be answered. Closing of Tender: 31 January 2024 at 14:00 ET.

### Contact Information
Subject to the terms and conditions of the contract, for more information about the solicitation, please contact:

- **Paul Fortier**
- **paul.fortier@dfo-mpo.gc.ca**
- **343-596-9926**

### Contracts Attachment
Please find the complete solicitation document at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29727/30004011-janitorial-services-ccg-base-en.pdf and: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29727/30004011-janitorial-services-contract-seal-cove-base-fr.pdf

## Note
Please note that this is a competitive solicitation. All interested parties must submit their bids in response to this solicitation.
